Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: Lankshire Parkway continues through the farm land to the north and south.
Room.LongDescription: The large Bushman Farms fruit and vegetable garden feeds virtually all of Oceancrest. Although fruits are not in great demand here, they are nevertheless required as a good source of vitamins. The Bushman Farms does fairly good business with both the city and as an exporter to other less fortunate towns.
